ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... what level are you?  i don t think i was ever at a level where i didn t want an enchanter in the group except when i was soloing thru level 5.
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:52 PM 6/27/00 -0600, you wrote:

>It's just that I have basically given up on grouping with the enchanters.
>It's nothing but a big headache. There's really not a whole lot I can do if
>my tanking is sub par and I can't use any songs that might awaken his mezzed
>mobs. So long as I can find a group that doesn't have enchanters in it I
>can do very well. Sometimes it's hard to find a group without one and
>that's when the suggestions begin.
>
> Kitasi

what level are you? i don't think i was ever at a level where i didn't want an
enchanter in the group except when i was soloing thru level 5.
